name: Haq, the Planet
description:
Haq, the Planet

A group of ancient, benevolent AGIs used to take care of this tiny world, but have recently mysteriously disappeared. Curiously, next to some powerful-looking machinery in an underground bunker, you've just encountered an old computer terminal which provides a miniaturized glimpse of the vast space beyond your home. You've heard stories about how the planet is kept safely running through the use of strange technology; perhaps this is where it all happens? While the view is beautiful, you realize the magnitude of the dangers from which the old artificial minds protected us. Unfortunately, the silly AGIs forgot to leave instructions on how to work the darn thing! That's really too bad, because those asteroids are looking a little ominous, and I don't think anyone else knows how to use these monstrous machines. What can this thing do? Guess we'll just have to hack into this old computer... We need to hack Haq.

Created in 72 hours for Lux Jam 2

Theme: "Hack the planet"

Music by Purple Planet

Assets and music tracks used are listed in the development log below.
